attributes.action: Car Noise Pollution- Modified Exhaust Systems
attributes.additional_details: When it’s illegal to modify the exhaust system to make a vehicle noisier after it has been ‘type approved’, why are there so many Cars (and other vehciles) blatantly ignoring this law? I understand it could be difficult to enforce on the road itself but why not enforce at the MOT test. Why does Noise pollution matter less than other emissions, especially when most modified vehicles tend to be driven in a manner to increase noise pollution (late at night).
